name: Arc'teryx Zeta SL Gore-Tex Pants - Men's
description: Keep your legs dry in stormy weather. These light waterproof pants are a worthy addition to your backcountry wardrobe. Hike through the storm in the alpine, perfect your J-stroke in a canoe, or walk through a rain-soaked meadow. They pack down nicely into your backpack and  keep you comfortable no matter what adventure you're on.40 denier nylon ripstop face fabric is light and packable, but strong.GORE-TEX® Paclite Plus technology ensures you stay dry and out of the wind.3/4 length polyurethane coated YKK® RC zippers open from thigh to ankle.Articulated fit through the knees improves comfort when you're moving.Waist closes with a zippered fly, snap closure and adjustable webbing.Reinforced insteps increase durability at the cuffs.Trim fit.
